well - defined facial boundaries.from sentence: To this end , we use well - defined facial boundaries to represent the geometric structure of the human face .

facial structure.from sentence: In this work , we represent facial structure using 13 boundary lines .

Our boundary - aware face alignment algo.from sentence:
Our boundary - aware face alignment algorithm contains two stages .
We first estimate facial boundary heatmaps and then regress landmarks with the help of boundary heatmaps .

jointly learned.from sentence: The boundary heatmap estimator , landmark regressor , and boundary effectiveness discriminator can be jointly learned in an end - to - end manner .

boundary heatmaps.from sentence: The boundary heatmaps serve as structure cue to guide feature learning for the landmark regressor .

relationship.from sentence: To explore the relationship between facial boundaries and landmarks , we introduce adversarial learning ideas by using a landmark - based boundary effectiveness discriminator .

stacked hourglass structure.from sentence: We used stacked hourglass structure to estimate facial boundary heatmap and model the structure between facial boundaries through message passing to increase its robustness to occlusion .
